# GET /v1/appCustomProductPageVersions/{id}/relationships/appCustomProductPageLocalizations | Apple Developer Documentation

-  GET /v1/appCustomProductPageVersions/{id}/relationships/appCustomProductPageLocalizations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appCustomProductPageVersions/{id}/relationships/appCustomProductPageLocalizations

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCustomProductPageVersions-_id_-relationships-appCustomProductPageLocalizations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appCustomProductPageVersions/{id}/relationships/appCustomProductPageLocalizations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCustomProductPageVersions-_id_-relationships-appCustomProductPageLocalizations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCustomProductPageVersions-_id_-relationships-appCustomProductPageLocalizations#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCustomProductPageVersions-_id_-relationships-appCustomProductPageLocalizations#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppCustomProductPageVersionAppCustomProductPageLocalizationsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appcustomproductpageversionappcustomproductpagelocalizationslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCustomProductPageVersions-_id_-relationships-appCustomProductPageLocalizations#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCustomProductPageVersions-_id_-relationships-appCustomProductPageLocalizations#Endpoints)

[`Read custom product page version information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appcustomproductpageversions-_id_)Get information about a specific app custom product page version.[`List custom product page versions`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appcustomproductpages-_id_-appcustomproductpageversions)List the versions for a custom product page version.[`List custom product pages localizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appcustomproductpageversions-_id_-appcustomproductpagelocalizations)List all localizations for an app custom product page.[`Create a custom product page version`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-appcustomproductpageversions)Add a version for your app custom product page.[`Modify a custom product page version`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-appcustomproductpageversions-_id_)Update the name and visibility status of an app custom product page.
